ingredients.content: 500 g aubergines, cut in pieces (3 cm)

preparations.content: Place water in mixing bowl. Place Varoma dish into position and weigh in aubergines. Cover and steam <b>15 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>. Set Varoma aside and discard steaming water.
Place garlic in mixing bowl and chop <b>5 sec/speed 8<b>.
Add onions and chop <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add oil and cumin then, without measuring cup, sauté <b>3 min/120°C/speed 1<b>.

Add reserved steamed aubergine, salt and pepper then, with measuring cup in place, chop <b>6 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula then cook <b>2 min/100°C/speed 3<b>. Serve warm with your favourite Indian bread.
